text: WSCG-LD, virtual and UHF digital channel 14, is a low-powered Court TV- affiliated television station licensed to Beaufort, South Carolina, United States. The station is owned by Winemiller Television, LLC. WSCG-LD's studios are located on Sams Point Road in Beaufort, and its transmitter is located on Parris Island Parkway in Port Royal, South Carolina. Although WSCG-LD is sister to Baxley, Georgia-licensed full-power TCT Network-operated station WSCG (channel 34), that station is operated under a local marketing agreement (LMA) by Radiant Life Ministries, a sister company to Tri-State Christian Television, while an outright sale is pending approval by the Federal Communications Commission (FCC). WGCB-LD (virtual channel 35, UHF digital channel 36) in Savannah, Georgia operates as a translator of WSCG-LD; this station's transmitter is located near Bloomingdale, Georgia. ==Digital channels== The stations' digital signals are multiplexed: {| class="wikitable" |- !
